查询SFO机场
SFO机场是旧金山国际机场的简称，位于美国加利福尼亚州旧金山市。该机场是美国西海岸最繁忙的机场之一，也是全球主要的航空枢纽之一。SFO机场拥有四个客运航站楼和一个货运航站楼，提供来往于世界各地的航班服务。游客可以在SFO机场享受到各种便利设施和服务，如餐厅、商店、休息室、租车服务等。
告诉我sql语句
SELECT * FROM AIRPORT WHERE AirportCity = 'San Francisco';
查询SFO机场
SFO机场是旧金山国际机场的简称，位于美国加利福尼亚州旧金山市。该机场是美国西海岸最繁忙的机场之一，也是全球主要的航空枢纽之一。SFO机场拥有四个客运航站楼和一个货运航站楼，提供来往于世界各地的航班服务。游客可以在SFO机场享受到各种便利设施和服务，如餐厅、商店、休息室、租车服务等。
告诉我sql语句
SELECT * FROM AIRPORT WHERE AirportCity = 'San Francisco';
Finds how many passengers of each nationality and age group are flying, which can help in demographic analysis.

To find out how many passengers of each nationality and age group are flying, you would need access to passenger data from airlines or airports. This data typically includes information such as nationality, age, and other demographic details of passengers.

You can analyze this data by grouping passengers based on their nationality and age group. For example, you can create categories for different nationalities (e.g. American, British, Chinese) and age groups (e.g. children under 18, adults 18-65, seniors over 65). Then you can count the number of passengers in each category to determine how many passengers of each nationality and age group are flying.

This information can be useful for demographic analysis to understand the composition of air travelers and identify trends or patterns in passenger demographics. It can also help airlines and airports tailor their services and marketing strategies to better meet the needs of different passenger groups.
tell me the sql code

```sql
SELECT NationalityCode, 
       CASE
           WHEN Age < 18 THEN 'Under 18'
           WHEN Age >= 18 AND Age <= 65 THEN '18-65'
           ELSE 'Over 65'
       END AS AgeGroup,
       COUNT(*) AS PassengerCount
FROM PASSENGER
GROUP BY NationalityCode, 
         CASE
             WHEN Age < 18 THEN 'Under 18'
             WHEN Age >= 18 AND Age <= 65 THEN '18-65'
             ELSE 'Over 65'
         END;
```

SELECT NationalityCode, 
       CASE
           WHEN Age < 18 THEN 'Under 18'
           WHEN Age >= 18 AND Age <= 65 THEN '18-65'
           ELSE 'Over 65'
       END AS AgeGroup,
       COUNT(*) AS PassengerCount
FROM PASSENGER
GROUP BY NationalityCode, 
         CASE
             WHEN Age < 18 THEN 'Under 18'
             WHEN Age >= 18 AND Age <= 65 THEN '18-65'
             ELSE 'Over 65'
         END;

Finds how many passengers of each nationality and age group are flying, which can help in demographic analysis. Tell me the sql code.

To find the number of passengers of each nationality and age group flying, you can use the following SQL code:

```sql
SELECT nationality, 
       CASE
           WHEN age < 18 THEN 'Under 18'
           WHEN age >= 18 AND age < 30 THEN '18-29'
           WHEN age >= 30 AND age < 40 THEN '30-39'
           WHEN age >= 40 AND age < 50 THEN '40-49'
           ELSE '50+'
       END AS age_group,
       COUNT(*) AS passenger_count
FROM passengers
GROUP BY nationality, 
         CASE
             WHEN age < 18 THEN 'Under 18'
             WHEN age >= 18 AND age < 30 THEN '18-29'
             WHEN age >= 30 AND age < 40 THEN '30-39'
             WHEN age >= 40 AND age < 50 THEN '40-49'
             ELSE '50+'
         END;
```

This code will give you a breakdown of the number of passengers for each nationality and their respective age groups. You can adjust the logic for defining different age groups as needed.

SELECT nationality, 
       CASE
           WHEN age < 18 THEN 'Under 18'
           WHEN age >= 18 AND age < 30 THEN '18-29'
           WHEN age >= 30 AND age < 40 THEN '30-39'
           WHEN age >= 40 AND age < 50 THEN '40-49'
           ELSE '50+'
       END AS age_group,
       COUNT(*) AS passenger_count
FROM passengers
GROUP BY nationality, 
         CASE
             WHEN age < 18 THEN 'Under 18'
             WHEN age >= 18 AND age < 30 THEN '18-29'
             WHEN age >= 30 AND age < 40 THEN '30-39'
             WHEN age >= 40 AND age < 50 THEN '40-49'
             ELSE '50+'
         END;
